question: Which company has launched the “Mask verification feature” in India?
explanation:
The Ride hailing company Uber has introduced a new safety feature named “Mask verification feature” in India.
This new feature will request users and riders booking a ride in Uber, to take a selfie of themselves wearing a mask, if they were tagged for not wearing mask on a previous trip in Uber. The feature was rolled out in the US and Canada initially.
